EmailTemplate.name: RE: Company Agreement--Fannie Mae/Jay Wenzler - UPDATE (1360017854.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Company Agreement--Fannie Mae/Jay Wenzler - UPDATE (1360017854.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Jay, Thank you so much for sending this my way. Ive enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful in finding your next project. - Here is a short list of some of our top clients within MBO Access <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf>. - We have an index of recorded Webinars that will comprehensively cover everything to do with working independently. You can see them by going here <http://www.mbopartners.com/resources>. - You can review our Independence Guide by going here. <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide> - Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke about over the phone by going here. <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html> (Please bookmark this page.) I will follow up with you, if you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule. <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS> Best of luck finding your next contract, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Weve got some serious perks youre eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: jay wenzler [mailto:jay@budler.net] Sent: Sunday, January 20, 2013 12:51 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Company Agreement--Fannie Mae/Jay Wenzler - UPDATE Importance: High Hi Sara,I know this is not really your area but the contract I was on got terminated unexpectedly (1/25 is my last day at Fannie Mae.)Im desperate to find employment so am putting my resume out to everyone who ive spoken to in the last months. Thanks in advance for any help you can be. Jay Wenzler,571.246.8589. On Jun 29, 2012, at 4:03 PM, Sara Conde wrote:Hi Don, Forgive me please find most recent updates attached. Thank you,Sara From: Sara Conde Sent: Friday, June 29, 2012 4:01 PM To: 'don.talley@itstaffinc.com <mailto:>' Cc: jay@budler.net <mailto:jay@budler.net> Subject: RE: Company Agreement--Fannie Mae/Jay Wenzler Importance: High Dear Don, On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with you and your organization. I have reviewed the agreement and enclosed the revised version with our information. I have included a copy that lists our changes and an expaliantion for each change. If you are curious about MBO Partners and what we do and how we work, we have a short one page overview that may answer some of your questions, which you may access by going here <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf>. I look forward to working with you, Best regards, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: don.talley@itstaffinc.com <mailto:don.talley@itstaffinc.com> [mailto:don.talley@itstaffinc.com] <mailto:[mailto:don.talley@itstaffinc.com]> Sent: Thursday, June 28, 2012 1:57 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Company Agreement--Fannie Mae/Jay Wenzler Hi Sara, When we work on a company to company arrangement, the staffing company would have to sign our Agreement and Purchase Order. Please see attached. Let me know if you have any questions. Best Regards
Donald Talley, Jr. IT Staffing, Inc. WBE Certified 732.421.8768 201.586.0389 - Fax don.talley@itstaffinc.com <mailto:don.talley@itstaffinc.com> www.itstaffinc.com <http://www.itstaffinc.com> http://www.linkedin.com/in/dtalley <http://www.linkedin.com/in/dtalley> <ITS Agency Purchase Order MBOPartners_MBO Edit.doc><ITS Agency Purchase Order MBOPartners_MBO Edit.doc> </body
